metadata.title: CVE-2024-50070 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: stm32: check devm_kasprintf() returned valuedevm_kasprintf() can return a NULL pointer on failure but this returnedvalue is not checked. Fix this lack and check the returned value.Found by code review.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
